front.title: Augmented-by Addition to the YANG Library

abstract.t: This document augments the ietf-yang-library to provide the augmented-by list. It facilitates the process of obtaining all dependencies between YANG modules, by querying the network management server's YANG library. This document updates RFC 8525. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/Zephyre777/draft-lincla-netconf-yang-library- augmentation.
